Uses of Package
adept.io

  • Packages that use adept.io 
    Package Description
    adept.io
    Provides I/O classes that handle reading/write files in different formats, including LDC Gigaword Corpus, ERE, CoNLL, email and plain text.
  • Classes in adept.io used by adept.io

    AMR
    AMR is a rooted, labeled graph to represent semantics.
